abstract: Kevin W. Sharer, the chief executive, and Dr. Roger M. Perlmutter, the head of research, will step down in 2012. The company’s growth has slowed in recent years.
snippet: Kevin W. Sharer, the chief executive, and Dr. Roger M. Perlmutter, the head of research, will step down in 2012. The company’s growth has slowed in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive and the head of research and development at Amgen will retire next year, both after more than a decade on the job, the company said Thursday.

headline.main: 2 Executives at Amgen Plan to Retire
